YouTubeGPT: Video Summary & Chat

🚀 Key Features:

- 📝 Video Summarization: Get the overview of the video with just one click.
- 💬 Chat with the video content: Ask deeper questions to better understand any details mentioned in the video.
- 💰 No Subscription Required: YouTubeGPT is completely free to use. Bring your own OpenAI API key to use.
- 🔒 Secure and Private: We do NOT store or transmit your OpenAI API key to our servers. It is stored locally within your browser.
- 🕒 Conversation History: YouTubeGPT keeps a record of all your past conversations, allowing you to revisit previous discussions and summaries.
